newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Xilinx rated a buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Xilinx rated a buy.

text.p: -- J.P. Morgan analyst Terry Ragsdale said in a research note that he initiated coverage of Xilinx Inc with a buy recommendation and an 18-month price target of $49 per share.
-- In early Nasdaq trade, Xilinx shares rose 1/8 to 33-7/8.
-- "With the semiconductor sector on the brink of a new up cycle, now is a good time to own chip stocks, especially those with a proprietary story such as Xilinx ..." the analyst wrote.
-- Also, "Xilinx is the number one player in programmable logic, one of the most attractive segments in the semiconductor industry."
-- For the fiscal year ending March 1997, the analyst estimates per share earnings of $1.43 per share and for the the 1998 fiscal year the outlook is $1.90 per share.
